Description.Text: The Imperial guest accommodation is an ideally situated and elegant licensed Victorian hotel in Plymouth. It stands between the famous Hoe and modern city center, and is within easy walking distance of the historic Barbi can with its Mayflower Steps and picturesque harbour front. Welcome to this stylish, extensively refurbished, family owned, licensed townhouse in Plymouth, where you will receive a friendly unpretentious greeting when you stay. CHECK IN TIME: Check in is available from 2pm to 10pm. CHECK OUT: Can be done any time before 10:30am.

Centrally located, just 2 Minutes walk from the famous Plymouth Hoe. Here you will find comfortable rooms to wind down or relax in. Use FREE wireless broadband which is available throughout most of the Hotel. The hotel also has a very comfortable lounge with wide screen television and video / DVD set. Plenty of lazy chairs and sofas to make you feel at home.

Single En-suite - All single en suite rooms have duvets, towels, flat screen colour television with Free view, private bath or shower with WC, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities and one Double bed.
Double En-suite - All Double en-suite rooms have one Double bed with duvets, towels, flat screen colour television with Free view, private bath or shower with WC, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities.
Twin En-suite - All Twin en-suite rooms have two Twin beds with duvets, towels, flat screen colour television with Free-view, private bath or shower with WC, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities.
King En-suite - All King en-suite rooms have one king bed with duvets, large bath towels, flat screen colour television with Free-view, private bath or shower with WC, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities.
Triple En-suite - Comprises a Double bed and the space to accomodate 2 further single beds. Rooms have duvets, towels, flat screen colour television with Freeview, private bath or shower with wc, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities.
Family En-suite - Comprises a Double bed and the space to accommodate 3 further single beds. Rooms have duvets, towels, flat screen colour television with Free view, private bath or shower with WC, radio, direct dial telephone, tea and coffee making facilities
Saver Twin - Saver Twin room offers two Twin beds with own bathroom next door.
Standard Apartment - A 2 bed-room self-catering apartment with lounge, kitchen diner and parking. Excellent location adjoining The Imperial. The apartment can be booked on a self-catering basis for one week arriving on a Friday from 2pm. Standard Apartment offers two Double beds and one Twin bed.
